Subject: Marketing Awareness
data: 11 Relationship banking is : A call center marketing B relation with marketing persons C relation close clients D relation with bankers and customers for retaining the customers Answer: Option [D]
12 What is innovation ? A new idea B new raw metarial C new product D all of these Answer: Option [D]
13 Cash is what type of asset of bank ? A Current B Intangible C Tangible D Fixed Answer: Option [A]
14 Which of the following is involved with the growth strategies of a company ? A Diversification B Horizontal integration C Vertical integration D All of these Answer: Option [D]
15 Internal marketing means : A marketing inside India B marketing inside company C marketing outside India D none of these Answer: Option [A]
16 Direct marketing means : A marketing through mobile B face to face marketing C mail D seminar presentation Answer: Option [D]
17 Market share means : A investment in share market B portion of market occupied by a company C government share in a company D none of these Answer: Option [B]
18 Which is not correct with respect to marketing ? A a team effort B an ancient concept C situational demand D a continuous effort Answer: Option [B]
19 The target group for home loans is : A builders B individuals that needs a home or flat C farmers D small scale industrialists Answer: Option [B]
20 Effective bank marketing requires : A affordable price B customer support C easy procedures D none of these Answer: Option [A]
21 ISI mark is not given to which of the following products? A Cloth B Biscuits C Hosiery goods D Electrical goods Answer: Option [B]

22 The size of the market for a product refers to A The number of potential buyers of the product B The volume of potential sales of the product C The geographical area served by the producers D The number of people in the given area Answer: Option [A]

23 What is ‘AGMARK’? A It stands for agricultural marketing B It represents agricultural management and regulation C It is marketing seal issued on the graded agricultural commodity D None of these Answer: Option [A]
24 AGMARK is a guarantee of standard: A Size B Weight C Quantity D Quality Answer: Option [D]
25 The expenses on advertising is called A Fixed cost B Surplus cost C Selling cost D Implicit cost Answer: Option [C]
26 The most accessible medium in India is A Cinema B Radio C Newspapers D Television Answer: Option [C]

27 Expenditure on advertisement and public relations by an enterprise is a part of its A Fixed capital B Intermediate consumption C Final consumption expenditure D Consumption of fixed capital Answer: Option [B]
28 The famous three P’s of environmental awareness are A People, Poverty, Politics B Population, Politics, Price C Power, Production, Pollution D Population, Poverty, Pollution Answer: Option [D]
29 Which one of the following goods has only exchange value? A Diamond B Rice C Computer D Television Answer: Option [A]

30 Which of the following is not an economic problem? A Deciding between paid work and leisure B Deciding between alternative methods of personal savings C Deciding between different ways of spending leisure time D Deciding between expenditure on one good and the other Answer: Option [C]
